channel.title: Yucko the " Clown "
channel.description:
Wow... This is the most amazing movie I have EVER seen... wow... A clown called yucko, is... well, a different kind of clown... Hmm... Is he:
A. Funny clown B. Sexist clown C. Mean clown D. Harrasment clown E. C and D
Well, if you answered E, then you are right.
Watch the movie. You will laugh. It's funny in a way, but it's also offensive.
Please do not watch this movie if you are too sensitive to offences, or if you do not want to hear swearing.
Wow...
[url=http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=-6700830286885068522&q=yucko]http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=-6700830286885068522&q=yucko[/url]
Discuss this movie here...
I found this on video google, or my friend showed me the movie.

item.title: Yucko the " Clown "

item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

F: All of the above
